HTabLabel

HTabLabel displays the ‘tab title button’ above the tab view.  Use HTabControl as the interface, don’t use HTabLabel directly.

Summary
HTabLabel
HTabLabel displays the ‘tab title button’ above the tab view.
Instance variables
setHighlight
Sets the tab ‘highlighted’ or not, depending on the flag parameter.
mouseDown
Performs tab selection/highlights.
setValue
Sets the highlight based on the value, use as a boolean flag.
refresh
Updates visual properties of the tab label.

Instance variables

type’[HTabControl]’
highlightThe highlight status of the tab.  True when tab is selected, otherwise false.

Extends

HControl

See Also

HTabControl HTabBar HTabView HView

NOTE

HTab -components are still evolving.

setHighlight

setHighlight: function(_flag)

Sets the tab ‘highlighted’ or not, depending on the flag parameter.  Called via HTabControl.selectTab.  Actual functionality in refresh

Parameters

_flagA flag that tells the label to highlight when true and hide the highlight when false.

See also

HTabControl.selectTab refresh

mouseDown

Performs tab selection/highlights.  Actual functionality in HTabControl.selectTab and setHighlight.

See also

HTabControl.selectTab setHighlight

setValue

setValue: function(_value)

Sets the highlight based on the value, use as a boolean flag.

Parameters

_valueSame as the flag in in setHighlight

See also

setHighlight

refresh

refresh: function()

Updates visual properties of the tab label.  Specifically, sets the visibility of the highlight effect element, if applicable.

See also

setHighlight
Generated by Natural Docs
setHighlight: function(_flag)
Sets the tab ‘highlighted’ or not, depending on the flag parameter.
setValue: function(_value)
Sets the highlight based on the value, use as a boolean flag.
refresh: function()
Updates visual properties of the tab label.
HTabControl is the main component of the HTabBar / HTabLabel / HTabControl / HTabView collection.
Abstract foundation class for all active visual components that implement events and values.
HTabBar has no logic functionality at all.
HTabBar has no logic functionality at all.
Abstract foundation class for all visual components.
selectTab: function(_tabId)
Selects (brings to ‘front’ / ‘shows’ / ‘activates’) the selected tab id and hides the previously active tab.
